data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Causeni to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Causeni, Moldova
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Causeni, Moldova by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, help the 3,750 believers in Causeni to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Causeni, Moldova that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Causeni, Moldova.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Causeni, Moldova a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Causeni, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.section_summary:
the state of Causeni, Moldova has a population of 81,200.

We estimate Causeni has 3,750 people who might know Jesus, 57,540 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 19,911 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 21 neighbors who need Jesus.
